## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Explain how this feature would improve the security demonstration or educational value.

## Proposed Implementation
If you have ideas on how this could be implemented, share them here.

## Security/Privacy Considerations
How does this feature relate to demonstrating privacy or security risks?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.
